titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that employees in classified positions in community colleges are not required to receive overtime compensation for service in a certified or other academic position.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E3045)

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.name: House Education and Labor
committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that community college employees in classified positions are not required to receive overtime compensation for additional service, on their own volition, in certified or academic positions.
